name: Flood: The Prequel (itch)
description:
Early Access Available 29 September 2017

You wake up one morning, just like any other day. You look at your T.V. and see there is nothing to watch. You check you email, then BAM!!! An angel appears in your home telling you that you are the Chosen of God and says he is going to send you to the time before the flood. You pass out and wake up in the body of a stranger. You explore his home and find everything to be so strange, where is the light switch, why do your clothes itch so bad? Finding a door you decide to see what is on the other side, stepping out into a village you barely recognize as one. 

The year 2349 B.C., you have 6 months before the flood, what do you do?
